page.title: 11Bentley School
page.content: The School was built in 1856 on land given by the Vicar Rev. Keene.It used to teach children up to school leaving age but is now a primary school teaching children between the ages of 5 and 11. The number of children on role varies between 60 and 70.There are 3 full time teaching staff:C Bishop(Head),M R Eccles(Deputy Head)and J Morrow.Mrs C Dawson will replace Miss Morrow when she leaves at the end of the 1985 summer term.Mrs R Gardner teaches part time and Mrs M Girling who was a pupil a school as a girl is the secretary and ancilliary helper. When children leave the school most of them join pupils from Capel St Mary,East Bergholt,Stratford St Mary Brantham and Copdock at East Bergholt High School until they are 16.
